questions.title: Are tor users able to access only tor zites?
questions.body:
Hello all. This is my first question here and I have been on zeronet for a couple of days only.

I have been using zeronet with tor through tor browser till now, and i have started setting a personal blog in here. However i have read in a redit post, a comment i haven't been able to verify. According to it, zites that are seeded by tor users in zeronet, can only be accessed by other zeronet users that also use tor.

Is this true? I mean, if i set up my site, the only ones that can read it are the people that use tor or have i terribly misunderstood the reddit comment?

Anyway, thanks for your time
